title: Metapiracy
author: VD
content_html:
I couldn’t help it. I happened to land upon a torrent consisting of the entire 1993 Psykosonik CD and couldn’t resist downloading it. So, is it piracy if you can’t find the CD you own, but you are the copyright holder?

I’m considering the possibility of filing a cease-and-desist order against myself. Although I suppose giving myself a very stern talking to about the evils of IP violation might suffice.
content_text:
I couldn’t help it.  I happened to land upon
a torrent
consisting of the entire 1993 Psykosonik CD and couldn’t resist downloading it.  So, is it piracy if you can’t find the CD you own, but you are the copyright holder?
I’m considering the possibility of filing a cease-and-desist order against myself.  Although I suppose giving myself a very stern talking to about the evils of IP violation might suffice.
